purpleculture_pinyin:
bō
to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc; to dial; to allocate; to set aside (money); to poke (the fire); to pluck (a string instrument); to turn round; classifier: group, batch
оттолкнуть рукой, ногой, палкой и т. д .; набрать; выделить; откладывать (деньги); тыкать (огонь); щипать (струнный инструмент); повернуться; классификатор: группа, партия
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 拨)
Ideographic: To dispatch 發 goods by hand 扌

撥打 [ bō dǎ ]: to call; to dial
撥付 [ bō fù ]: appropriate sum of money

heisig_chinese_memo: The courier's job is to use her fingers to allocate your portion of her truck's mail to you.
Ru_trainchinese:
bō: (глаг/сч.слово) выделять (напр., средства); группа
bō: (глаг) набирать (номер телефона)
bō: (глаг) переместить или отрегулировать, перебирать (струны)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: to make an emission (發) the hand (扌) needs a plectrum
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The courier allocates mail to different people with his fingers and a delivery van.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to "sound", the original meaning is governance and rectification. "Shuowen": "Zhiye. From the hands, make a sound." "Poetry‧Songs of Shang‧Long Hair": "Xuanwang Huanzhuan." Mao Chuan: "Call, control."

" Dial " can mean separate or set aside. "Book of Rites-Qu Li Shang": "I will be impromptu, not tolerate; pull the clothes with both hands, go to the same feet; without pulling the clothes, without kicking the feet." Sun Xidan's collection: "If you tend to go, the clothes are easy to remove."

" Dial " also means extinction and extinction. "Poetry·Daya·Dang": "The branches and leaves are not harmful, the truth is first." Zheng Xuanjian: "Pan, still absolutely."

" Dial " can mean wrong, that is, skewed. "Guan Zi‧ Zhou He": "The husband's rope is right when you support it; if it is accurate, the risk is level; the hook is in vain and it goes straight." Guo Moruo and other schools quoted Zhang Wenhu: "relatively."

" Dial " also means discarding or removing. Han Liu Xiang "Nine Sighs-Xi Xian": "To set aside flattery and circumvent the evil, to cut down on the custom."

" Dial " also means provocation. Tang Qin Taoyu, "Chang'an Shuhuai": "The cold breeze blows the rain and the cold is more, and the homesickness deceives others to make a difference."

" Dial " also means collision and friction. Tang Cen Shen, "Zou Ma Chuan, Sending Doctor Feng to the West Expedition": "The army marches in the middle of the night, and the limelight is like a knife."

" Call " can mean to put aside. Tang Dufu "September 1st Meng Twelve Warehouse and Cao Fourteen Master Book Brothers": "The strength is thin and the tree rests, the old sleepy sleeps the book."

Allocation and allocation can also be indicated by " dial ". "Water Margin" Chapter 3: "Because I have no one to help here, I sent him to be a prosecutor."

" Dial " can be used as a noun to mean comb. "New Songs on the Jade Terrace-Emperor Liang Jianwen": "Tong'an temples, different foreheads yellow." Wu Zhaoyi's note: "Women use wood for the temples, shaped like jujube cores, with two ends The pointy point can be two inches long. It is lacquered and used to loosen temples. It is called temple jujube."

" Dial " is also used as a quantifier to indicate batches and partnerships and is used to group people. "Song History‧ Li Zhi 24": "A total of 1,260 people, one for every 60 people."
humanum_short_description_en: From " hand " to "sound", the original meaning is governance and rectification.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「發」聲，本義為治理、整頓。《說文》：「治也。从手，發聲。」《詩‧商頌‧長髮》：「玄王桓撥。」毛傳：「撥，治。」

　　「撥」可表示分開、撥開。《禮記‧曲禮上》：「將即席，容毋怍；兩手摳衣，去齊尺；衣毋撥，足毋蹶。」孫希旦集解：「趨走則衣易撥開。」

　　「撥」也表示滅絕、斷絕。《詩‧大雅‧蕩》：「枝葉未有害，本實先撥。」鄭玄箋：「撥，猶絕也。」

　　「撥」可指不正，即歪斜。《管子‧宙合》：「夫繩，扶撥以為正；準，壞險以為平；鉤，入枉而出直。」郭沫若等集校引張文虎曰：「撥，傾也，與『正』相對。」

　　「撥」亦表示廢棄、除去。漢劉向《九嘆‧惜賢》：「撥諂諛而匡邪兮，切淟涊之流俗。」

　　「撥」還表示挑動。唐秦韜玉〈長安書懷〉：「涼風吹雨滴寒更，鄉思欺人撥不平。」

　　「撥」也表示碰撞、摩擦。唐岑參〈走馬川奉送封大夫出師西征〉：「半夜軍行戈相撥，風頭如刀面如割。」

　　「撥」可表示拋開。唐杜甫〈九月一日過孟十二倉曹十四主簿兄弟〉：「力稀經樹歇，老困撥書眠。」

　　調撥、分配也可以「撥」表示。《水滸傳》第3回：「為因俺這裏無人幫護，撥他來做個提轄。」

　　「撥」可作名詞，表示梳具。《玉臺新詠‧梁簡文帝〈戲贈麗人〉》：「同安鬢裏撥，異作額間黃。」吳兆宜注：「婦女理鬢用撥，以木為之，形如棗核，兩頭尖尖，可二寸長，以漆光澤，用以鬆鬢，名曰鬢棗。」

　　「撥」也用作量詞，表示批、夥，用於人的分組。《宋史‧禮志二四》：「共一千二百六十人，每六十人作一撥。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「發」聲，本義為治理、整頓。

English Definition: to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc; to dial; to allocate; to set aside (money); to poke (the fire); to pluck (a string instrument); to turn round; classifier: group, batch
Total strokes: 15; Radical: 手

Mao Chuan: "Call, control." " Dial" can mean separate or set aside. "Book of Rites-Qu Li Shang": "I will be impromptu, not tolerate; pull the clothes with both hands, go to the same feet; without pulling the clothes, without kicking the feet." Sun Xidan's collection: "If you tend to go, the clothes are easy to remove." " Dial" also means extinction and extinction. "Poetry·Daya·Dang": "The branches and leaves are not harmful, the truth is first." Zheng Xuanjian: "Pan, still absolutely." " Dial" can mean wrong, that is, skewed. "Guan Zi‧ Zhou He": "The husband's rope is right when you support it; if it is accurate, the risk is level; the hook is in vain and it goes straight." Guo Moruo and other schools quoted Zhang Wenhu: "relatively." " Dial" also means discarding or removing. Han Liu Xiang "Nine Sighs-Xi Xian": "To set aside flattery and circumvent the evil, to cut down on the custom." " Dial" also means provocation. Tang Qin Taoyu, "Chang'an Shuhuai": "The cold breeze blows the rain and the cold is more, and the homesickness deceives others to make a difference." " Dial" also means collision and friction. Tang Cen Shen, "Zou Ma Chuan, Sending Doctor Feng to the West Expedition": "The army marches in the middle of the night, and the limelight is like a knife." " Call" can mean to put aside. Tang Dufu "September 1st Meng Twelve Warehouse and Cao Fourteen Master Book Brothers": "The strength is thin and the tree rests, the old sleepy sleeps the book." Allocation and allocation can also be indicated by " dial". "Water Margin" Chapter 3: "Because I have no one to help here, I sent him to be a prosecutor." " Dial" can be used as a noun to mean comb. "New Songs on the Jade Terrace-Emperor Liang Jianwen": "Tong'an temples, different foreheads yellow." Wu Zhaoyi's note: "Women use wood for the temples, shaped like jujube cores, with two ends The pointy point can be two inches long. It is lacquered and used to loosen temples. 撥字的基本解释

撥
bō
见“拨”。

撥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bō］
［《廣韻》北末切，入末，幫。］
“拨1”的繁体字。
(1)治理；整顿。
(2)分开；拨开。
(3)挑动；逗引。
(4)争取；取得。
(5)掉转。
(6)碰撞；摩擦。
(7)拨弄。
(8)指点。
(9)泼；洒泼。
(10)弹奏弦乐器的一种手法。
(11)指弹拨弦乐器的用具。
(12)调拨；分配。
(13)抛开。
(14)废弃；除去。
(15)灭绝；断绝。
(16)不正。
(17)量词。批；伙。用于人的分组。
(18)方言。被；给。
(19)梳具。
(20)引申为梳理。
(21)绋。出丧时牵引灵车的绳子。
(22)用同“醱”。参见“撥醅”。
[②]［fá］
“拨2”的繁体字。
大盾。

撥字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撥； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页455第11
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?北末切，音鉢。【說文】治也。【詩·商頌】?王桓撥。【公羊傳·哀十四年】撥亂世，反諸正，莫近於春秋。　又除也。【前漢·司馬遷傳】秦撥去古文，焚滅詩書。　又發揚貌。【禮·曲禮】衣毋撥。　又【增韻】捩開也。又轉之也。【戰國策】弓撥矢鉤。【註】撥，弓反也。　又葬具。【禮·檀弓】廢輴而設撥，竊禮之不中者也。【註】撥可撥引輴車，所謂紼也。　又鼓弦之物。【唐書·蘇頲傳】皇甫恂使蜀，檄取庫錢，市琵琶捍撥玲瓏鞭，頲不肯予。　又叱撥，良馬名。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?蒲襏切，音跋。絕也。【詩·大雅】枝葉未有害，本實先撥。箋撥，猶絕也。疏撥去餘根，故猶絕也。　又【詩·朱傳】叶方吠切，音廢。又叶必列切，音龞。義?同。　又【唐韻】【集韻】?普活切，音潑。芟草也。與發同。亦作?。　又撥剌，張弓貌。【張衡·思?賦】彎威弧之撥剌。【註】剌，音力達反。　又【史記·索隱】房越切，音伐。謂大楯也。【史記·孔子世家】會于夾谷，齊有司請奏四方之樂，于

[①]［bō］
["Guangyun" cut at the north end, enter the end, help. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "Dial 1".
(1) Governance; rectification.
(2) Separate; set aside.
(3) Provocative; teasing.
(4) Strive for; obtain.
(5) Turn around.
(6) Collision; friction.
(7) Fiddle.
(8) Give pointers.
(9) Splash; Splash.
(10) A method of playing stringed instruments.
(11) Refers to the utensils of plucked stringed instruments.
(12) Allocation; allocation.
(13) Put aside.
(14) Discard; remove.
(15) Extinction; extinction.
(16) Incorrect.
(17) Quantifiers. Batch; buddy. Used for grouping people.
(18) Dialects. Be given.
(19) Combs.
(20) The extension is combing.
(21) 绋. Towing the rope of the hearse during the funeral.
(22) Use the same as "酦". See "Dialing 醅".
[②]［fá］
